Absolutely worth the money. My buddy and I both went pro when the game released for Xbox One and man has it helped. All I could say to improve the experience is an update for 0.63's new airfield and surrounding area which I can expect is coming soon and a way for the members of the group to draw on the map with a stylus or finger. This feature would make route plotting a breeze. Keep up the good work, can't wait to see this app evolve with the game!
